About Me

Hi, my name is Domitille and I’m a PhD student working on plant specialized metabolites variation genetic component.
In my project:
1) I identified the genetic basis of leaf specialized metabolites in sessile oak using genome-wide association approaches using genomic and metabolomic data.
2) I studied specialized metabolites gene expression plasticity induced by the infection of Fusarium graminearum in modern bread wheat varieties using transcriptomic data.

I’m looking for a post-doc position starting January 2024.
